title: Why We Need Seven Hours of Sleep
narration: Kya aap jaante hain ki hamein har raat saat ghante ki neend ki zaroorat kyon hoti hai Is video mein hum dekhenge ki saat ghante ki neend aapke sharir aur dimaag ke liye kitni zaroori hai. Hum iske faayde aur agar aapko neend na aaye toh kya karna chahiye yeh bhi jaanenge.

title: Benefits of Seven Hours of Sleep
content:
Improved cognitive function
Enhanced physical health
Better emotional regulation
Strengthened immune system
image_desc: Person sleeping peacefully. Type: stock photo
narration: Saat ghante ki neend lene se aapka dimaag theek se kaam karta hai. Aapki yaadashth tez hoti hai aur aap cheezon ko behtar tareeke se samajh paate hain. Yeh aapke sharir ko bhi swasth rakhta hai aapki emotional health ko sudharta hai aur aapki rog pratirodhak shamta ko badhata hai.

title: Cognitive Function and Sleep
content:
Memory consolidation
Improved focus and concentration
Enhanced problem-solving skills
image_desc: Brain activity during sleep. Type: illustration
narration: Neend ke dauraan aapka dimaag din bhar seekhi hui cheezon ko yaad karta hai. Yeh aapki concentration ko bhi badhata hai jisse aap kisi bhi kaam par dhyan kendrit kar paate hain. Saath hi yeh aapki problemsolving skills ko bhi sudharta hai jisse aap mushkil samasyaon ko aasaani se hal kar sakte hain.

title: Physical Health and Sleep
content:
Reduced risk of chronic diseases
Improved metabolism
Muscle repair and growth
image_desc: Healthy heart and lungs. Type: illustration
narration: Paryaapt neend lene se aapko dil ki beemari diabetes aur mote hone ka khatra kam hota hai. Yeh aapke metabolism ko bhi sudharta hai jisse aapka vajan niyantrit rehta hai. Neend ke dauraan aapke muscles repair hote hain aur badhte hain jisse aapki physical strength badhti hai.

title: Tips for Better Sleep
content:
**Establish a Routine**
Go to bed and wake up at the same time every day.
Create a relaxing bedtime ritual.
**Optimize Your Environment**
Make sure your bedroom is dark, quiet, and cool.
Invest in a comfortable mattress and pillows.
narration: Apni neend ko behtar banane ke liye har roz ek hi samay par sone aur uthne ki aadat banaen. Sone se pehle ek relaxing routine banaen jaise ki kitaab padhna ya garam paani se nahana. Apne kamre ko andhera shaant aur thanda rakhen. Aur ek aaramdayak mattress aur takiye mein invest karen.

title: What Happens When You Don't Get Enough Sleep?
content:
Impaired cognitive function
Weakened immune system
Increased risk of accidents
Mood swings and irritability
narration: Jab aapko paryaapt neend nahi milti hai toh aapka dimaag theek se kaam nahi karta. Aapki rog pratirodhak shamta kamzor ho jaati hai jisse aap beemar hone ke zyada khatre mein hote hain. Accidents ka khatra badh jaata hai aur aap mood swings aur irritability ka shikaar ho sakte hain. Isliye saat ghante ki neend lena bahut zaroori hai.
